lead_paragraph: Quarterback Brady Quinn seemed to fade as a Heisman trophy candidate in the first half before bouncing back in the second as the Fighting Irish overcame a 17-point deficit to raise their record to 3-1.
snippet: Quarterback Brady Quinn seemed to fade as a Heisman trophy candidate in the first half before bouncing back in the second as the Fighting Irish overcame a 17-point deficit to raise their record to 3-1.
